title: Living tomorrow. No. 145
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Certain scientific developments have an immediate appeal - appeal based on their inherent elegance. Looks at four ideas in science: 1. Geodesic structures. 2. An umbrella to form a temporary seal on a punctured boat. 3. Specific drugs. 4. Linear electric motor for a weaving shuttle/loom or high speed trains.
